item.title: [Project No-Doze] Update
item.dc:creator: @Raynee Raynee
item.description:
@Raynee wrote:

Hi,

Is there anything wrong with this update command? When I run it, the timer pops up however it doesn’t countdown (it just stays as ‘System update in: xx’). Occasionally it flickers but it just goes back to normal almost instantly after.

Tried to find a solution many times but idk about it, perhaps it’s a problem client sided?

Code:

if(client.getPrivileges() == 3) { PlayerManager.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7))); PlayerManager.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerManager.updateRunning = true; PlayerManager.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); GameEngine.getGlobalActions().sendMessage("System updating..."); }

Source: Project No-Doze by Killamess (Shard)
